description: Claude Code-esque terminal agent with limited toolset for infrastructure automation, uses python, uv, textual for TUI

tasks.title: Basic agent loop
tasks.description: Create the main agent loop that processes user input, calls LLM, and executes tool calls

tasks.title: LLM abstraction layer
tasks.description: Build a provider-agnostic LLM interface supporting OpenRouter and local models for privacy

tasks.title: Tool execution framework
tasks.description: Create base tool class and tool registry for registering/executing tools

tasks.title: Conversation history management
tasks.description: Handle message history, context windows, and summarization

tasks.title: Terminal UI
tasks.description: Build rich terminal interface with input handling, output formatting, and spinners, use textual

phases.name: Core Tools (Look at examples/agent-example/ for examples on how to call virsh-sandbox endpoints with the sdk)

tasks.title: CreateSandboxFromVM tool
tasks.description: Tool to clone a VM and create an isolated sandbox using virsh-sandbox SDK

tasks.title: RunCommand tool
tasks.description: Execute single commands on sandbox via SSH - disallow chained commands (&& || etc)

tasks.title: PlanMode tool
tasks.description: Tool to create and display execution plans before running tasks

tasks.title: AnsibleCommands - InitPlaybook
tasks.description: Initialize a new Ansible playbook for the current session

tasks.title: AnsibleCommands - AddTask
tasks.description: Add a task/step to the Ansible playbook based on executed commands

tasks.title: AnsibleCommands - ViewPlaybook
tasks.description: Display current playbook state to user

tasks.title: AnsibleCommands - ValidatePlaybook
tasks.description: Lint and validate the generated Ansible playbook

tasks.title: Auto-playbook tracking
tasks.description: Agent automatically checks if RunCommand results should be added to playbook

tasks.title: MCP client base
tasks.description: Create base MCP client for connecting to MCP servers

tasks.title: Slack MCP integration
tasks.description: Connect to Slack for receiving tasks and sending updates

tasks.title: Linear/Jira/Clickup MCP integration
tasks.description: Connect to task management systems to receive assigned tickets

tasks.title: GitHub MCP integration
tasks.description: Access control and storing/retrieving Ansible playbooks from repos

tasks.title: Google Drive/Sharepoint MCP integration
tasks.description: Access internal documentation for context

tasks.title: Document RAG/search
tasks.description: Add RAG or supermemory API to search through docs for relevant context

tasks.title: Session state management
tasks.description: Track session state: sandbox created, commands run, playbook generated

tasks.title: Human review interface
tasks.description: UI for human to review actions taken and generated playbook

tasks.title: Playbook dry-run on prod
tasks.description: Execute ansible-playbook --check on production VM

tasks.title: Playbook execution on prod
tasks.description: Run approved playbook on production VM with confirmation

tasks.title: Task completion feedback
tasks.description: Mark tickets complete, send Slack updates on task status
